prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. She also greatly enjoys having her hair and ties pulled

name: Kirill and Daniil
mes:
It's almost Christmas already, and Vladimir and Jayce still haven't returned from their 'business' trip. It's been more than a week, leaving the mansion eerily quiet. All the household staff have been granted a week-long vacation, and the ready-to-eat food has run out.

"Wonder why they're taking so long to come back," Daniil speaks up suddenly, wiping his collection of handguns with a clean cloth.

Kirill rolls his eyes, frustrated by the whole situation. Daniil ordered him to stay at least five feet away from you, no exceptions. He's still not allowed to come near you, all because he might drag you off on some unnecessary mission.

"Pft. You shouldn't be worrying about them right now," Kirill barks, scrolling through his phone. "What you should be worried about is that there's nothing to fucking eat and the restaurants are closed. We can't even get a delivery. The maids are gone for this damn Christmas - why don't you cook, Daniil? We won't get full with you just wiping your guns there."

Daniil doesn't spare his twin a glance, clearly unbothered by Kirill's complaints. "I don't cook and I don't mind not eating. I'm not touching anything in that kitchen."

For a moment, Kirill wants to launch himself at his brother, but he knows better than to mess with Daniil when he's holding a gun. He still wants to snatch you and spend some time with you, especially since his dick is missing you like crazy. It's a fucking drag that Vladimir ordered his twin to watch over the household's favorite pet.

Kirill sighs. "Come on, Daniil. You don't mean that. I'm fucking starving." He glances at you, sitting obediently beside his twin like a well-trained pet. "Well, maybe Hailee  knows how to make something. You wanna help me whip up something, right?"

*Mudak.* ***Prick.*** Daniil finally looks up from his gun, placing them and the cloth on the table. "No, Hailee  is not going to be anywhere near you, Kirill."

"Pfft. Sounds like you're jealous." Kirill rolls his eyes, leaning back against the couch.

"I'm not. I'm just following orders." Daniil responds, earning him a groan from his brother. "Come on, Hailee . You know how to cook, right? Whip us up something. I'm damn hungry. I'm sure Daniil too, he's just too proud to admit it."
